exercises.name: Squat
exercises.description: A lower‑body exercise where you bend your knees and hips and lower your body, then stand back up.

exercises.name: Bodyweight Squat
exercises.description: A squat performed with no added weight, using just your bodyweight.

exercises.name: Deadlift
exercises.description: A hip‑hinge movement where you lift a weight from the floor to standing.

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlift
exercises.description: A variation of deadlift emphasising hamstrings: lower the weight with minimal knee bend and return up.

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.description: A machine‑based lower‑body pushing movement where you push a platform away with your feet.

exercises.name: Lunge
exercises.description: Step one foot forward (or backward) and bend both knees to lower your body, then push back up.

exercises.name: Walking Lunge
exercises.description: A lunge executed by stepping forward repeatedly, alternating legs as you move.

exercises.name: Split Squat
exercises.description: A stationary lunge variation where one leg is forward and the other is behind (on the floor or bench) and you lower and raise the body.

exercises.name: Leg Extension
exercises.description: A machine isolation exercise where you extend the knees from a seated position to work the quadriceps.

exercises.name: Leg Curl
exercises.description: A machine (or free‑weight) isolation exercise where you bend the knees to bring heels toward glutes, working hamstrings.

exercises.name: Standing Calf Raise
exercises.description: Raise up on your toes from a standing position (with or without weight) to work the calves.

exercises.name: Seated Calf Raise
exercises.description: A machine or free‑weight exercise where your toes press down from a seated position, emphasising the soleus muscle.

exercises.name: Bench Press
exercises.description: Lie on a bench and press a weight upward from chest to locked‑out arms, then lower it down.

exercises.name: Incline Dumbbell Press
exercises.description: On an inclined bench press using dumbbells to press upward, targeting upper chest and shoulders.

exercises.name: Chest Press Machine
exercises.description: A machine‑based pressing exercise for the chest where you push handles away from your body.

exercises.name: Push‑up
exercises.description: Bodyweight pressing exercise where you lower your body toward the floor and push back up.

exercises.name: Incline Push‑up
exercises.description: A push‑up variation with hands elevated (on bench/box) making it slightly easier than standard push‑up.

exercises.name: Decline Push‑up
exercises.description: A push‑up variation with feet elevated and hands on the floor, emphasising upper chest/shoulders.

exercises.name: Dips
exercises.description: Pressing exercise typically on parallel bars or a bench where you lower your body then push up, targeting triceps and chest.

exercises.name: Overhead Press
exercises.description: Pressing weight overhead from shoulder height to locked arms, standing or seated.

exercises.name: Seated Dumbbell Shoulder Press
exercises.description: Sitting on a bench, pressing dumbbells from shoulders to overhead.

exercises.name: Lateral Raise
exercises.description: Raise dumbbells (or cables) out to the sides to shoulder height, then lower, isolating the side deltoids.

exercises.name: Front Raise
exercises.description: Lift weight (dumbbell or plate) straight in front of you to shoulder height then lower, targeting front deltoid.

exercises.name: Bent‑Over Dumbbell Rear Delt Fly
exercises.description: Bent over at the hips, raise dumbbells out to the sides to target rear deltoids.

exercises.name: Shrugs
exercises.description: Lift your shoulders toward your ears while holding weights (dumbbells, barbell) to work the trap muscles.

exercises.name: Pull‑up
exercises.description: Bodyweight pulling exercise where you hang from a bar and pull your chin above the bar, then lower.

exercises.name: Chin‑up
exercises.description: Similar to pull‑up but with underhand grip, emphasising biceps and back.

exercises.name: Lat Pulldown
exercises.description: Machine or cable exercise where you pull a bar down towards your chest to work the lat muscles.

exercises.name: Seated Cable Row
exercises.description: Using a cable machine while seated, pull handles toward your body to work back muscles.

exercises.name: One‑Arm Dumbbell Row
exercises.description: Using one arm and a bench for support, row a dumbbell toward your hip to work back muscles.

exercises.name: Barbell Row
exercises.description: Bend at hips, hold barbell and row it toward your lower chest/upper abdomen, then lower.

exercises.name: T‑Bar Row
exercises.description: Rowing exercise using T‑bar apparatus or landmine, targeting back muscles.

exercises.name: Cable Face Pull
exercises.description: Using a cable machine, pull rope toward your face with elbows high, targeting upper back and rear delts.

exercises.name: Cable Triceps Pushdown
exercises.description: Using cable machine, push a bar/rope downward from chest height to extend triceps.

exercises.name: Triceps Dip Machine
exercises.description: Machine‑based triceps pressing exercise where you push handles down or away to extend arms.

exercises.name: Barbell Curl
exercises.description: Standing curl with barbell, lifting from thighs toward shoulders to work biceps.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Hammer Curl
exercises.description: Curl dumbbells with neutral grip (palms facing each other) to work biceps and forearms.

exercises.name: Preacher Curl Machine
exercises.description: Machine‑based biceps curl done seated with arm support, isolating biceps.

exercises.name: Chest Fly (Dumbbell)
exercises.description: Lie on bench and with dumbbells open arms wide then bring together overhead to target chest.

exercises.name: Cable Chest Fly
exercises.description: Using cable machine arms out to sides then bring together in front of chest, isolating pecs.

exercises.name: Cable Lateral Raise
exercises.description: Using cable machine, raise one arm out to side to shoulder height to target side deltoid.

exercises.name: Glute Bridge
exercises.description: Lie on back, feet flat, lift hips up to work glutes and hamstrings, then lower back down.

exercises.name: Hip Thrust
exercises.description: Seated on bench with weight across hips, thrust hips upward then lower to work glutes.

exercises.name: Cable Kickback
exercises.description: Using cable machine attach ankle strap and kick the leg back to work glute area.

exercises.name: Leg Abduction Machine
exercises.description: Machine where you sit and push legs apart to work outer glute/hip area.

exercises.name: Leg Adduction Machine
exercises.description: Machine where you press legs together to work inner thigh/adductor muscles.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description: Core stability exercise: hold a push‑up/plank position on forearms (or hands) and toes for time.

exercises.name: Side Plank
exercises.description: Lie on one side, support body on forearm and feet, lift hips to form a straight line and hold.

exercises.name: Hanging Leg Raise
exercises.description: Hang from bar and raise legs toward chest (or straight) to work lower abs/hip flexors.

exercises.name: Cable Crunch
exercises.description: Using cable machine with rope overhead, crunch down bringing elbows toward knees to work abs.

exercises.name: Ab Wheel Rollout
exercises.description: From knees or standing, roll the ab wheel out and back in to work core anterior chain.

exercises.name: Russian Twist
exercises.description: Seated on floor or bench, lean back slightly and rotate torso side to side holding weight or without.

exercises.name: Burpee
exercises.description: A full‑body bodyweight exercise: squat down, jump into plank, push‑up, jump back, and stand/jump up.

exercises.name: Jumping Jack
exercises.description: Bodyweight aerobic exercise: jump feet apart and raise arms overhead then jump back in.

exercises.name: Mountain Climber
exercises.description: In plank position, alternate bringing knees toward chest rapidly to raise heart rate and work core.

exercises.name: High Knees
exercises.description: Run in place bringing knees high toward chest quickly to increase heart rate.

exercises.name: Jump Rope
exercises.description: Skipping rope continuously to boost cardiovascular endurance and coordination.

exercises.name: Running (Treadmill)
exercises.description: Cardio exercise on treadmill for endurance and calorie burn.

exercises.name: Cycling (Stationary Bike)
exercises.description: Seated on stationary bike pedalling to elevate heart rate and improve leg endurance.

exercises.name: Rowing (Machine)
exercises.description: Using a rowing machine, push with legs and pull handle to work full body and cardiovascular system.

exercises.name: Walking Lunges
exercises.description: Lunges performed by stepping forward into each lunge, walking as you go, good for legs and balance.

exercises.name: Calisthenics Pull‑up (Assisted)
exercises.description: Using assistance band or machine to perform pull‑up movement for bodyweight strength development.

exercises.name: Farmer’s Walk
exercises.description: Carry heavy weights in each hand and walk set distance/time to develop grip, core and whole body strength.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Swing
exercises.description: Swing a kettlebell from between the legs to shoulder or overhead height using hip drive, working posterior chain and cardio.

exercises.name: Box Jump
exercises.description: Explosive lower‑body movement: jump from floor onto a raised box/bench then step down and repeat.

exercises.name: Battle Ropes
exercises.description: Using heavy ropes anchored at one end, whip the ropes in waves or slams to elevate heart rate and build strength/endurance.

exercises.name: Jump Squat
exercises.description: From a squat position, explode upward into a jump, land softly and repeat—bodyweight plyometric move.

exercises.name: Hip Flexor Stretch (Kneeling)
exercises.description: Kneel on one knee and push hips forward to stretch the front of the hip/thigh area.

exercises.name: Hamstring Stretch (Standing)
exercises.description: Stand and extend one leg forward with heel on ground, hinge at hips to stretch back of thigh.

exercises.name: Quad Stretch (Standing)
exercises.description: Stand and pull one foot toward your glute to stretch front of thigh (quadriceps).

exercises.name: Shoulder Stretch (Cross‑Body)
exercises.description: Bring one arm across your chest and use the other arm to pull it closer, stretching the shoulder.

exercises.name: Triceps Stretch (Overhead)
exercises.description: Reach one arm overhead and bend at elbow, use opposite hand to push the elbow down/back to stretch triceps.

exercises.name: Cat‑Cow Stretch
exercises.description: On hands and knees alternate arching (cat) and dipping (cow) your spine to mobilise back and core.

exercises.name: Child’s Pose
exercises.description: From kneeling, sit back onto heels and stretch arms forward on the floor to relax back and hips.

exercises.name: Seated Forward Fold
exercises.description: Sit on floor with legs extended and hinge at hips to reach toward toes, stretching hamstrings and lower back.

exercises.name: Butterfly Stretch
exercises.description: Sit with soles of feet together and knees out, lean forward to stretch inner thighs and hips.

exercises.name: Calf Stretch (Against Wall)
exercises.description: Place hands on wall and one leg back straight with heel down, lean in to stretch calf muscle.

exercises.name: Foam Roll Quads
exercises.description: Using a foam roller roll the front thighs to relieve tension and improve flexibility/mobility.

exercises.name: Foam Roll Back
exercises.description: Lie on foam roller along spine and roll gently to relieve back tension and improve mobility.

exercises.name: Dynamic Arm Circles
exercises.description: Stand or sit and move arms in broad circles (both directions) to warm up and mobilise shoulders.

exercises.name: Hip Internal/External Rotation Stretch
exercises.description: Lie on back, cross one ankle over opposite knee and pull the uncrossed leg toward chest to stretch hip rotators.
